remarks: Two ways of saying a number is less than or equal to the maximum of two others.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)
statement:
istsr.1 $e |- X = dom R $.
tsrlemax $p |- ( ( R e. TosetRel /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( A R if ( B R C , C , B ) <-> ( A R B \/ A R C ) ) ) $.
